title: Kenneth Cole Reaction Home Frost Shower Curtain at Bed Bath & Beyond
description: Add delicate, yet modern, sophistication to your bathroom with the Kenneth Cole Reaction Home Frost Shower Curtain. Boasting clean lines and precise embroidery, this light-hued curtain softens your décor with an elegant touch. Thanks for watching.

asset.author: Bed Bath & Beyond
asset.hookText:
http://www.bedbathandbeyond.com/product.asp?SKU=40937939
Add delicate, yet modern, sophistication to your bathroom with the Kenneth Cole Reaction Home Frost Shower Curtain. Boasting clean lines and precise embroidery, this light-hued curtain softens your décor with an elegant touch. Thanks for watching. Make sure to subscribe to the Bed Bath & Beyond YouTube Channel.

transcripts: Exclusively for Bed Bath and Beyond the Frost shower curtain designed in the studios of Kenneth Cole was inspired by his accessories collection. Our 72 inch by 72 inch shower curtain is heavily embroidered in the same pattern as the frost bedding ensemble. The luxurious satin ground is the perfect canvas for the shimmering embroidery details. Also available are coordinating bath mats and towels. The frost shower curtain is part of the Kenneth Cole reaction home collection. It is available exclusively online and at select Bed Bath and Beyond stores.
